scenes.title: Scene 1: Opening Credits
scenes.description: The video begins with opening credits, displaying text such as 'A Show Don't Tell Short Film' and 'Written & Directed by Vincent Bossel'.

scenes.title: Scene 2: Chef in the Kitchen
scenes.description: A chef in a white uniform and hat is seen standing in a modern kitchen, preparing vegetables at the sink.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Cleaning Ingredients
scenes.description: The chef is washing grapes under running water at the sink, focusing on food preparation.

scenes.title: Scene 4: Cutting and Garnishing
scenes.description: The chef is seen finely chopping herbs and preparing ingredients, including slicing a grape and adding seasoning, displaying precision in preparation.

scenes.title: Scene 5: Final Touches
scenes.description: The chef holds up a piece of paper tape, potentially indicating measurement or presentation, and examines a bowl closely, demonstrating attention to detail.

scenes.title: Scene 1: Setting the Table
scenes.description: The chef stands in front of a bowl on a reflective surface in dim lighting.

scenes.title: Scene 2: Entering the Dining Room
scenes.description: The chef enters a dark room holding a covered dish, walking towards a table with a person sitting at it, illuminated by candlelight.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Holding the Dish
scenes.description: Close-up of the chef's hand holding the dish in a poised manner, ready to serve.

scenes.title: Scene 1: Introspection
scenes.description: A person is seen sitting shirtless in a dimly lit room with candles, appearing to be in a contemplative state.

scenes.title: Scene 2: Amidst the Smoke
scenes.description: Smoke surrounds the person who is holding a cigarette, suggesting a moment of solitude and reflection.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Pensive Mood
scenes.description: The person sits by a sink, smoke fills the space, and they appear deep in thought, gesturing with their hands.

scenes.title: Scene 1: Acknowledgements
scenes.description: The credits roll on a black screen, acknowledging the cook and production team.
